strength_training_template.name: Strength Training
strength_training_template.description: Build maximum strength and power through heavy resistance training

rest_periods.description: 2-5 minutes between sets for full recovery

intensity.description: Heavy loads for maximum strength adaptation

periodization.description: Progressive overload with gradual intensity increases

strength_training_template.training_focus: Maximum strength, neural adaptations, power development

hypertrophy_template.name: Hypertrophy Training
hypertrophy_template.description: Build muscle mass through moderate intensity, higher volume training

rest_periods.description: Moderate rest for metabolic stress and muscle growth

intensity.description: Moderate loads for optimal muscle building

periodization.description: Varied rep ranges and intensities for continuous adaptation

hypertrophy_template.training_focus: Muscle hypertrophy, metabolic stress, muscle damage

power_training_template.name: Power Training
power_training_template.description: Develop explosive strength and speed through dynamic movements

intensity.description: Moderate loads moved explosively for power development

periodization.description: Concentrated blocks of power training with adequate recovery

power_training_template.training_focus: Explosive power, rate of force development, speed-strength

endurance_template.name: Muscular Endurance
endurance_template.description: Improve muscle endurance and cardiovascular fitness

rest_periods.description: Short rest to maintain elevated heart rate

intensity.description: Light to moderate loads for endurance adaptations

periodization.description: Progressive volume increases with consistent intensity

endurance_template.training_focus: Muscular endurance, cardiovascular fitness, metabolic conditioning

fat_loss_template.name: Fat Loss Training
fat_loss_template.description: Optimize body composition through metabolic training

rest_periods.description: Short rest to maintain elevated heart rate and calorie burn

intensity.description: Moderate intensity for sustained metabolic demand

periodization.description: High volume, varied exercises with minimal rest

fat_loss_template.training_focus: Fat loss, metabolic conditioning, muscle preservation

general_fitness_template.name: General Fitness
general_fitness_template.description: Well-rounded fitness development for overall health

rest_periods.description: Moderate rest for balanced training adaptation

intensity.description: Moderate intensity for general fitness improvements

periodization.description: Varied training stimuli for well-rounded fitness

general_fitness_template.training_focus: Overall fitness, strength, endurance, body composition
